function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);
var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);
var onlineUrl = document.querySelector(‘#onlineUrl’);
var onlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlinePriceRaw’);
var onlineShippingRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlineShippingRaw’);
var onlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#onlineDay’);
var onlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#onlineMonth’);
var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);
var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineStoreName = document.querySelector(‘#offlineStoreName’);
var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,
enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

});

Price: $29.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:21:01 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Light Bulbs

Outdoor LED Spotlight

Outdoor Lamp

EDISHINE has been focusing on the unity of practicality and decorativeness. Dedicated to banish the darkness and bring light to millions of families, while making your living space more beautiful and cozy. Specializing in indoor and outdoor lighting fixtures such as floor lamps, pendant lamps, table lamps, ceiling lamps, wall lamps, floodlights and more, meeting all your lighting needs from spacious front door to narrow bedside table.

【Flexible & Stable】Equipped with 6ft SJTW 18/3C extension cord, this outdoor plug in flood light is flexible enough to offer greater installation range without extra extension cord, easy for you to plug it into any polarized outlet; the included ground stake helps to keep fixture more stable
【Easy to Install & Adjustable Head】Just use the screw and nut cap to connect the ground stake, then put your bulb (not included) into the socket; you can adjust the direction of the flood light head by adjusting the screw to change the direction of the light, meet your different illumination needs
【E26 Socket】 E26 base only supports maximum of 150W PAR38 bulbs (bulbs not included); with high quality ceramic lamp base, our outdoor flood light fixture is high temperature resistance and durable, eliminating the hassle of frequent bulb replacement and saving your money
【Wide Application & Warranty】The outdoor flood light holders have passed the wet location test, can be used in humid environments and weather, ideal for yard, patio, flag, holiday decor; UL listed and 1-Year Warranty provided, our service team is always glad to help you within 24 hours





EDISHINE is a professional manufacturer specializing in Home Improvement and Indoor & Outdoor Lightings. Our primary aim is to provide you and other valuable members with higher quality products, A satisfying shopping experience is amongst our top priorities.

Outdoor Light Socket

Decorate Your Yard

Heavily weatherproof and waterproof performance floodlights made of sturdy material with shock-resistant closed lens housing that can withstand rain, snow, sleet, dirt, and dust in the outdoors.

120° Adjustable neck allows for the proper angle without the hassle repositioning.

Warm Tips:

This outdoor light does not contain bulbs, only par38 bulbs are used to ensure the waterproofness of the light.

  • Specification:
  • Input Voltage:120Vac, 60Hz
  • Waterproof:IP65
  • Meterial:Die-cast Aluminum
  • Recommended bulb type: par38 bulb (max 150W)

Read more




Flexible Angle

The Head of outdoor flood spotlight could be adjusted up to 120°，while if you want to adjust its angle, just loosen the nut, adjust the angle, and then tighten it.

Heavy Duty Cord

6 ft SJTW 18/3C heavy duty extension cord and the standard ground plug allow it to install directly instead of complex wiring, just plug it in in seconds and then enjoy your new yard after night falls.

Suitable for Any Weather

Only par38 bulbs with E26 base, maximum power 150W. The par38 bulb can be tightly fitted with the waterproof rubber ring to avoid the flooding of the outdoor light cocket.

Read more



Spot Light Outdoor with 3 lenses 1200lm Dusk to Dawn 120V Spotlight RGB Light Sensor Spotlight with 3 lenses 3000K 2-Level Dimmable Spotlight 1200lm Dusk to Dawn 120V Spotlight RGB Light Sensor Spotlight with 3 lenses
Power 4.8W 12W 12W 507lm 8.75W/263lm 4W 12W 12W
Color White/Red/Green/Yellow White White/Red/Green/Yellow Warm White White White/Red/Green/Yellow
Installition Plug in Plug in/Wall Mount Plug in/Wall Mount Plug in Plug in/Wall Mount Plug in/Wall Mount

#36 in Decorative Outdoor Lighting Projectors
Date First Available July 25, 2022

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $39.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:28:15 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Christmas Projector Lights

Control the movement speed of the projector light to make the lights dance, create a romantic Christmas atmosphere.

Outdoor & Indoor Use

Red and Green Projector Light

Wall-mounted

【Wide Coverage】With a larger projection area and clearer picture quality, this newest upgraded Christmas light projector can cover up to 3800sf from a distance of 33ft. Anytime, anywhere, create a a cool afffect for you. The power cord of our outdoor star show light is extended to 9.84 ft, which can reach many places. Don’t worry about running out of power outdoors. Perfect for Christmas, birthday parties, festival, party, landscape and wedding decoration
【Remote Control & Timer】50ft barrier free control, easily control the movement speed of the light, change the color of the light. What’s more, this christmas lights outdoor projector has a timer function (0.5h, 3h, 5h and 8h). No need to worry about power consumption, these noiseless rotating light visuals will accompany you into a warm dream
【Easy Installation】Comes with a long ground stake and round base, to insert the projection lamp into the ground or just place on the ground/table/home. Besides, it can also be mounted on th wall. Easy to move to get any areas, it only takes 1 second to create a romantic atmosphere full of stunning illumination!
【Weather Resistance】The outdoor projector light with IP65 waterproof rating, high strength, high toughness. So you do not need to worry about snow, rain, dust and strong sunlight. Rotate the projector head, to fill any place you want with romantic star light (Note: the power plug is IP44 waterproof, do not expose it water or moisture!)

Read more

Christmas Projector Lights Outdoor with Remote Control & Timer, Weather Resistance, Wide Coverage, 6 Patterns

Adjustable projection distance & Super large projection area

  • The best projection distance of this christmas projector light is 16ft-33ft.
  • The upgraded Christmas projector light has a larger projection area and clearer picture quality. Collocated with 360° adjustable projector head, construct a dreamy fairy tale world for you.

Star Shower Christmas Projector Lights Outdoor

With red and green lights blinking on the house, wall, ceiling, and lawn, our Christmas projection lights create a romantic holiday atmosphere

Package Includes

1 x Christmas Projector light

1 x Ground stake

1 x Remote

1 x AC adapter with 3m cable

1 x User instruction

Specification

  • Operating voltages:120V
  • DC adapter:5V 3W
  • Operating temperature: -25℃ to 35℃
  • Material: plastic
  • Waterproof Rank of Light: IP65
  • Waterproof Rank of Plug: IP44
  • Effective removal of the remote control: <15m
  • Scope of application: indoor & outdoor

Read more

Christmas Lights Outdoor Projector

No need for long ladders, complicated installations, troublesome dismantling decorations, or climbing on the house. Say goodbye to traditional hanging string lights. Just turn on our Christmas projector Lights and get a beautiful meteor shower in no time. Great for holiday and commercial ambient decorations, also a fantastic Christmas gift for lover, family, friends, or colleagues.

Flexible Installation

  • Placed on plane; Ground-mounted; Wall-mounted

Read more

Weather Resistance

With IP65 waterproof rating, our christmas lights outdoor projector has high strength, high toughness. Don’t worry about rain, snow, dust, and intense sunlight, enjoy the wonderful and fairy Christmas world.

Wonderful Landscape Spotlight

6 patterns (snowflake, Jingle bell, Christmas tree, Santa Claus, Fireworks and starry sky); 3 working modes (green, red, green and red mixed). Create vivid and beautiful light with the different projector angle.

Outdoor & Indoor Use

Equipped with a round base and ground stake, the star show projector light can be placed anywhere(indoor placement, ground-mounted, wall-mounted). 9.84ft extended power cord solves outdoor wiring issue.

Read more

Remote Control

  • 50ft barrier free control, no point to point operation, easily control the movement speed of the starry projector lamp, change the color of the light.
  • Timer Function: 0.5h, 3h, 5h and 8h on. No need to worry about power consumption, switch the light off at regular intervals.
  • Power cord is 9.84ft. No worry about not being able to touch the power source outdoors.

4.5
Price: $39.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:28:15 UTC – Details)

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $49.99 - $29.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:27:08 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Easy Set Up for Outdoor & Indoor Lighting

Warm Tips:

The recommended installation height is 6.56ft-13.12ft, the best installation height is 8ft-9ft.If you want to install security camera on the opposite side of the battery lights, please avoid infrared directly irradiated or reflection on the sensor.Make sure batteries are inserted correctly before you test activation.It is Battery Powered, NOT Solar Powered, NOT AC Power Hardwired.Note: Please allow 1% failure rate of the outdoor motion light due to the long distance of transport maybe cause damage or accessories lost. Just find us for a replacement if there is something wrong or get your spend back if it doesn’t meet your need.

Batterries Type
4*D-Cell Batterries 4*D-Cell Batterries USB Rechargeable 4*AA Batterries 4*D-Cell Batterries

Sensor Mode

✓

✓

✓

✓

480 300 300 180 300

6000K 6000K 6000K 6000K 3000K

Sale
under 30(with coupon) 26(with coupon) 30(with coupon) under 20(with coupon) 23(with coupon)

Mount
Wall/Tree Ceiling/Closet/Wall Ceiling/Closet/Wall Ceiling/Closet/Wall Ceiling/Closet/Wall

Security Lights Features:

Wattage: 4.5WLumens: 480LM(whole light fixture)Color Temperature: 5500K-6500KSensing Angle: 180degreeDetection Distance: 30-35 feetLifespan: 50,000 Hours+Voltage: 6VBattery: (4 D-cell batteries per light, not included)light coverage: 500 square footWaterproof: IP65

TOOWELL Battery Operated Outdoor Flood Lights

Instant Convenience with Motion Detector Lights

Installation instructions：

1. Use a flat head screwdriver to remove the Mounting Plate

2. Insert 4 D-cell Batteries and revert the battery lid

3. Mark the fixed position and fix the mounting plate on the wall

4. Line up the light with the mounting plate and slide the light into grooves

Package Contents:

1 x PIR LED Outdoor Motion Sensor Light

1 x User Manual

4 screws and 4 anchors

Outdoor Battery Operated Lights (NOT Solar Powered)

Friendly Motion Sensor Light Mode: With an advanced sensitive photocell sensor, the battery powered Led flood light will be activated and stay on for the 20s (when the ambient light is lower than 15LUX). Stay off at the daytime(only sensing motion in darkness). Auto LED motion detection security light like a steward ensures safety for children,pets,and the old from dusk to dawn.
Save Money on an Electrician: Outdoor battery operated floodlight adopt wireless wall-mounted design,Easy to install this outdoor lights for house and yard in minutes–No main power or wiring or professional electrician required.Where sunlight and electricity can’t reach, TOOWELL battery operated outdoor lights can light up.
Customized Your Beam Angle：Adjustable angle brings flexible light to your home. Battery powered spotlights Dual head support 135°up to down,180°side to side pivot, customized led spot lights coverage area around the house.
Efficient Battery Powered Outdoor Light: LED units output 4.5w,480lumen,5500K(daylight white), equivalent to 50W halogen light, a brand new set of 4*D batteries standby time up to 180 days. saving your electricity bill by up to 80%.
Sensitive and Durable：Battery powered Security light with upgrade technic motion sensor can be triggered by the moving human, cars, or animals up to 30 feet sensing range at 180°motion detection angle. When motion caught, it lighting.
3 Years Warranty：Based on its reliable and durable performance,we offer 3-year warranty while others are just 1 year，customer service team provides 7*24 hrs help, and your satisfaction is 100% guaranteed. You don’t need to send the prdoduct back if TOOWELL product did not meet your expectation,Please contact us and get your money back.

Easy Set Up for Outdoor & Indoor Lighting

Warm Tips:

  • The recommended installation height is 6.56ft-13.12ft, the best installation height is 8ft-9ft.
  • If you want to install security camera on the opposite side of the battery lights, please avoid infrared directly irradiated or reflection on the sensor.
  • Make sure batteries are inserted correctly before you test activation.
  • It is Battery Powered, NOT Solar Powered, NOT AC Power Hardwired.
  • Note: Please allow 1% failure rate of the outdoor motion light due to the long distance of transport maybe cause damage or accessories lost. Just find us for a replacement if there is something wrong or get your spend back if it doesn’t meet your need.

Read more

Security Lights Features:

  • Wattage: 4.5W
  • Lumens: 480LM(whole light fixture)
  • Color Temperature: 5500K-6500K
  • Sensing Angle: 180degree
  • Detection Distance: 30-35 feet
  • Lifespan: 50,000 Hours+
  • Voltage: 6V
  • Battery: (4 D-cell batteries per light, not included)
  • light coverage: 500 square foot
  • Waterproof: IP65

TOOWELL Battery Operated Outdoor Flood Lights

Instant Convenience with Motion Detector Lights

Installation instructions：

1. Use a flat head screwdriver to remove the Mounting Plate

2. Insert 4 D-cell Batteries and revert the battery lid

3. Mark the fixed position and fix the mounting plate on the wall

4. Line up the light with the mounting plate and slide the light into grooves

Package Contents:

1 x PIR LED Outdoor Motion Sensor Light

1 x User Manual

4 screws and 4 anchors

Product Description

Christmas Projector Lights Specifications: Input: AC 100V~240V Output: DC 4.5V/1500MA Maximum Coverage: 1500 square feet Effective Remote Distance: 49 feet Product Size:⌀0.33 ft(H) Working Temperature: -13 to 113℉ Power Cable: 16 ft Waterproof Levels: IP65

The house projector lights can show rotating white snowflake patterns, casting a realistic snow scene in your room.

Why do you choose this Christmas snowflake projector light?

Say goodbye to the traditional hanging string lights, illuminating your house within minutes. Just nail it to the ground, plug it in, and aim it at a wall, or any other plane, and it can project white snowflake on the wall or at home. This ensures that there is no extra need to install lighting or be made of any other decorative materials. The wonderful realistic snowflake makes you enjoy the Christmas scene, brings you an unforgettable Christmas experience.

The projector lights come with 16 feet cable, long enough to put it anywhere you want. IP65 waterproof design, and durable material lights body perfect for indoor and outdoor Christmas holiday decorations, parties and themed events, or to create an impressive focal point.

Outdoor Decoration

16-feet long cable makes you have the freedom to position your lights outdoor anywhere. A smart choice to avoid running extension cables across your yard all Christmas.

Indoor Decoration

The snowflakes keep moving automatically like a natural snowfall and will bring you a pleasant and warm Christmas atmosphere, making your family reunion more precious and wonderful.

Flexible Adjustable Angle

Aim your snowfall wherever you like and it can be accurately projected onto the ceiling, floor, or Christmas tree to give your home that sumptuous cozy winter glow.

Wide Projection Range

With a projection area of 1500 sq. ft, your house, courtyard, porch, and garden will be completely covered by romantic and dreamy snowflakes.

Bright and Clear Lighting

High brightness and clear snowstorm images are widely used in discos, clubs, pubs, bars, New year, Valentine’s Day, birthdays, parties, Christmas, weddings, family parties, etc.

Weather Resistant

IP65 waterproof snowflake projectors are made of high-quality materials. Come rain, shine, or heavy ice, you can rest easy knowing that your projector will always be protected.

Diameter/Width
26 Inches 57 Inches 19.2 Inches 36 Inches

Great effect Christmas projector lights outdoor can cover 1500 sq.ft. Brighter, clearer images allow you to fully enjoy a realistic Christmas scene, soft LED lighting provides better eye protection.
IP65 Warterproof Snowfall projector lights comes with 16 feet cable, long enough to put it anywhere you want, and works well even when it rains or snows. It’s definitely the best Christmas holiday decoration for any house.
Easy installation Snowflake projector lights for indoor and outdoor use, the stand base can be placed directly on any flat surface, or fixed on the wall with screws. Long ground stake for easy positioning in your garden.
24 HOURS ONLINE – Your satisfaction is our main priority. You can contact our 24 hours available customer service through clicking “”Sold by”” on the product detail page or your Amazon order page and you will be directed to “”Ask a question”” to send us a message.

Product Description

2 Pack Motion Sensor Outdoor Lights Battery Powered

Motion Sensor + Light Sensor: In the dark, the light will automatically light up when it senses motion within 16ft(5m). High Brightness: 600LM 6000K white light ensures high brightness lighting in the dark. 360° Adjustable: The light head can be rotated 360 °, you can freely adjust it to the angle you need during installation. Battery Powered: The motion sensor outdoor light is powered by 4 D-cell batteries (not included) and is not charged by wires.

LED Motion Lights Outdoor

Super Bright LED Sensor Light

This motion sensor light has 4 high power LED with 6000K white light. In the outdoor or indoor dark environment, the extremely high brightness of 600LM provides you with perfect lighting.

360° Adjustable Security Light

Our outdoor security light head can be rotated 360°, so you can freely adjust the angle according to your needs.

Outdoor Spotlight Waterproof

The IP65 waterproof spotlight is perfect for outdoor use, and the product material is rust-proof and durable with ABS plastic.

Motion Detector Lights for Outside and Indoor Use

Front door lights

At night, when you come home, the sensor light will turn on automatically, you can open the door more quickly and conveniently.

Garage lights

Garage outdoor security lights to help you see the road better and park easier.

Storage room lights

When you are storing items in a closed storage room, our motion sensor lights can provide you with good lighting.

Stairs lights

This motion sensor light is also suitable for stairs and hallways, so you will not stumble in the dark.

【PIR Sensor Motion Detection】In darkness or at night, the motion sensor lights automatically light up when detect motion within 16 feet (5m). After 30 seconds of no motion detected, the light will automatically turn off.
【Multi-Angle Adjustment】Our outdoor security light head can be rotated 360°, the light base can be swung back and forth 180°, you can freely adjust the angle according to your needs.
【Waterproof and Durable】IP65 waterproof, the material is rust-proof and durable ABS plastic. It provides you with perfect lighting outdoors in rain and snow.
【Battery Powered & Easy Installation】The battery operated outdoor lights powered by 4 D-cell batteries (not included), and the base is fixed to the wall with the included 4 mounting screws.

2 Pack Motion Sensor Outdoor Lights Battery Powered

  • Motion Sensor + Light Sensor: In the dark, the light will automatically light up when it senses motion within 16ft(5m).
  • High Brightness: 600LM 6000K white light ensures high brightness lighting in the dark.
  • 360° Adjustable: The light head can be rotated 360 °, you can freely adjust it to the angle you need during installation.
  • Battery Powered: The motion sensor outdoor light is powered by 4 D-cell batteries (not included) and is not charged by wires.
